Articles.Content:
Hi all, for testing purposes I want to edit my save and change the skill of a few kerbals. I know bout the CrewRoster field, but I don't know which parameters specify what skill a kerbal has. Any ideas?

Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

According to [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103745-Editing-the-traits-abilities-%28pilot-scientist-engineer%29-of-the-Kerbals), a kerbal's trait (Pilot, Engineer, Scientist) is a function of their name. So if you change their name in the persistent.sfs file, their occupation will also change. [Ship Manifest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62270) has the ability to change a kerbal's trait without changing the name you see in the game.
Wow. What an odd way to determine crew trait. Ok, I will get Ship Manifest. Thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
